name: Organizations in the target population and selected for the sample, by industry: FY 2021
description: Organizations in the target population and selected for the sample, by industry: FY 2021

creator.name: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics

variableMeasured.name: field_organizations_selected_for_the_sample_all_organizations
variableMeasured.description: Organizations Selected For The Sample All Organizations

variableMeasured.name: field_organizations_selected_for_the_sample_noncertainties
variableMeasured.description: Organizations Selected For The Sample Noncertainties

variableMeasured.name: field_organizations_selected_for_the_sample_certainties
variableMeasured.description: Organizations Selected For The Sample Certainties

notes: Numbers are rounded for disclosure protection purposes. Certainty organizations have a selection probability of one and a sampling weight of one and represent only themselves. Organizations are selected with certainty based on known R&D activities and larger than stratum-specific payroll cutoffs.Noncertainties are organizations with a probability of selection of less than 1.
sources: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics and Census Bureau, Nonprofit Research Activities FY 2021 module of the 2022 Annual Business Survey.
